languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, Дом Орселлио нижайше просит вашей милости и прощения. Мы не могли и представить, что в наших рядах таятся эти... мерзкие крысы. А уж чтобы они проникли во дворец Вольного Торговца и устроили немыслимое преступление... Бог-Император свидетель — проклятые ренегаты желают рассорить наши династии!"

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец, Дом Орселлио нижайше просит вашей милости и прощения. Мы не могли и представить, что в наших рядах таятся эти... мерзкие крысы. А уж чтобы они проникли во дворец Вольного Торговца и устроили немыслимое преступление... Бог-Император свидетель — проклятые ренегаты желают рассорить наши династии!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Rogue Trader, House Orsellio humbly asks for your lenience and forgiveness. We could not even imagine these... vile rats could be scurrying among our ranks. As for them sneaking into the Rogue Trader's palace and staging an unthinkable crime... God-Emperor be our witness, the accursed renegades seek to spark a feud between our houses!"
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, Дом Орселлио нижайше просит вашей милости и прощения. Мы не могли и представить, что в наших рядах таятся эти... мерзкие крысы. As for them sneaking into the Rogue Trader's palace and staging an unthinkable crime... God-Emperor be my witness, the accursed renegades seek to spark a feud between our Houses!"

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Trader, House Orsellio humbly asks for your lenience and forgiveness. We could not even imagine these... vile rats could be scurrying among our ranks. As for them sneaking into the Rogue Trader's palace and staging an unthinkable crime... God-Emperor be our witness, the accursed renegades seek to spark a feud between our houses!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: “行商浪人，奥赛罗家族谦卑地恳求您的宽恕与仁慈。我们根本无从想象……这群卑劣的老鼠居然会潜伏在我们的随行人员之中。他们居然还潜入行商浪人的宫殿，犯下了无法想象的罪行……愿神皇为我们作证，这些该死的叛徒打算在您的家族与我的家族之间挑起一场血仇！”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, House Orsellio humbly asks for your lenience and forgiveness. We could not even imagine these... vile rats could be scurrying among our ranks. As for them sneaking into the Rogue Trader's palace and staging an unthinkable crime... God-Emperor be our witness, the accursed renegades seek to spark a feud between our houses!"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人，奥塞罗家族谦卑地恳求您的宽恕与仁慈。我们根本无从想象……这群卑劣的老鼠居然会潜伏在我们的随行人员之中。他们居然还潜入行商浪人的宫殿，犯下了无法想象的罪行……愿神皇为我作证，这些该死的叛徒打算在您的家族与我的家族之间挑起一场血仇！”
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: «Comerciante Independiente, la casa Orsellio solicita humildemente su indulgencia y su perdón. No podíamos imaginar que estas... ratas inmundas estaban en nuestras filas. E infiltrarse en el palacio de {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente para perpetrar un crimen tan inconcebible... Por el Dios Emperador, ¡estos malditos renegados buscan sembrar la cizaña entre nuestras casas!».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, House Orsellio humbly asks for your lenience and forgiveness. We could not even imagine these... vile rats could be scurrying among our ranks. As for them sneaking into the Rogue Trader's palace and staging an unthinkable crime... God-Emperor be our witness, the accursed renegades seek to spark a feud between our houses!"

traits.locale_text: «Comerciante Independiente, la casa Orsellio solicita humildemente su indulgencia y su perdón. No podíamos imaginar que estas... ratas inmundas estaban en nuestras filas. E infiltrarse en el palacio de {mf|un|una} Comerciante Independiente para perpetrar un crimen tan inconcebible... Por el Dios Emperador, ¡estos malditos renegados buscan sembrar la cizaña entre nuestras casas!».
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: 「自由開拓者、オーセリオ家はあなたに寛大な慈悲と容赦をお願い申し上げる。このような下劣なネズミが我々の仲間に紛れ込んでいるとは想像すらできなかった…自由開拓者の宮殿に忍び込み、想像を絶する罪を犯すとは…神帝陛下よ、照覧あれ、邪悪な半額者が、両家の間に確執をもたらそうとしたのを！」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, House Orsellio humbly asks for your lenience and forgiveness. We could not even imagine these... vile rats could be scurrying among our ranks. As for them sneaking into the Rogue Trader's palace and staging an unthinkable crime... God-Emperor be our witness, the accursed renegades seek to spark a feud between our houses!"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者、オーセリオ家はあなたに寛大な慈悲と容赦をお願い申し上げる。このような下劣なネズミが我々の仲間に紛れ込んでいるとは想像すらできなかった…自由開拓者の宮殿に忍び込み、想像を絶する罪を犯すとは…神帝陛下よ、照覧あれ、邪悪な半額者が、両家の間に確執をもたらそうとしたのを！」
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, das Haus Orsellio bittet demütig um Nachsicht und Vergebung. Wir hätten niemals gedacht, dass solch ... dreckige Ratten in unseren Reihen herumlaufen. Dass sie sich in den Palast {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} einschleichen, um ein unvorstellbares Verbrechen zu begehen ... Der Gottimperator sei unser Zeuge, die verfluchten Abtrünnigen wollen Zwist zwischen unseren Häusern säen!"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, House Orsellio humbly asks for your lenience and forgiveness. We could not even imagine these... vile rats could be scurrying among our ranks. As for them sneaking into the Rogue Trader's palace and staging an unthinkable crime... God-Emperor be our witness, the accursed renegades seek to spark a feud between our houses!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}, das Haus Orsellio bittet demütig um Nachsicht und Vergebung. Wir hätten niemals gedacht, dass solch ... dreckige Ratten in unseren Reihen herumlaufen. Dass sie sich in den Palast {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} einschleichen, um ein unvorstellbares Verbrechen zu begehen ... Der Gottimperator sei mein Zeuge, die verfluchten Abtrünnigen wollen Zwist zwischen unseren Häusern säen!"
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, la maison Orsellio vous présente ses plus plates excuses et vous demande de faire preuve d'indulgence. Nous n'aurions jamais imaginé compter dans nos rangs une telle... vermine. Dire que ces rats se sont introduits dans le palais {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et qu'ils ont failli commettre l'impardonnable... Que l'Empereur-Dieu nous en soit témoin, ces maudits renégats cherchent assurément à déclencher un conflit entre nos maisons ! »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, House Orsellio humbly asks for your lenience and forgiveness. We could not even imagine these... vile rats could be scurrying among our ranks. As for them sneaking into the Rogue Trader's palace and staging an unthinkable crime... God-Emperor be our witness, the accursed renegades seek to spark a feud between our houses!"

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Libre-marchand|Libre-marchande}, la maison Orsellio vous présente ses plus plates excuses et vous demande de faire preuve d'indulgence. Nous n'aurions jamais imaginé compter dans nos rangs une telle... vermine. Dire que ces rats se sont introduits dans le palais {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} et qu'ils ont manqué commettre l'impardonnable... Que l'Empereur-Dieu nous en soit témoin, ces maudits renégats cherchent assurément à déclencher un conflit entre nos maisons ! »
traits.speaker: NaviLeader

languages.text: "Hür Tacir, Orsellio Hanesi hoşgörünüzü ve affınızı rica ediyor. Aramızda böylesi hain sıçanların dolaştığını hayal bile etmezdik. Hür Tacir'in sarayına sızmaları ve akla hayale gelmeyecek bir suç işlemiş olmaları... Tanrı İmparator şahidim olsun ki bu kahrolası hainler, hanelerimiz arasında bir çatışmaya neden olmak istiyor!"
languages.original_text: "Rogue Trader, House Orsellio humbly asks for your lenience and forgiveness. We could not even imagine these... vile rats could be scurrying among our ranks. As for them sneaking into the Rogue Trader's palace and staging an unthinkable crime... God-Emperor be our witness, the accursed renegades seek to spark a feud between our houses!"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir, Orsellio Hanesi hoşgörünüzü ve affınızı rica ediyor. Aramızda böylesi hain sıçanların dolaştığını hayal bile etmezdik. Hür Tacir'in sarayına sızmaları ve akla hayale gelmeyecek bir suç işlemiş olmaları... Tanrı İmparator şahidim olsun ki bu kahrolası hainler, hanelerimiz arasında bir çatışmaya neden olmak istiyor!"
